description:
In his behind-the-scenes video with Gage, Danny mentioned that he had been fucked (but didn't mention by whom). That little snippet was actually left in accidently. But the cat is out of the bag about what will be appearing in the near future.
Before he was fucked with a real cock, Danny had done a practice video with dildos and other sex toys in order to get him ready.
I thought it would be fun to show as a bonus video for this week...
title: Danny's Toys
